rows.label: qst105707_msg0002
rows.name:
Papa...! I didn't... want to reunite
like this... *wheeze* *wheeze*...

rows.label: qst105707_msg0003
rows.name:
You came so suddenly,
I was surprised, mo.

rows.label: qst105707_msg0004
rows.name:
I brought him along because
he said he'd be interrogated
if it was with Bahn, but...

rows.label: qst105707_msg0005
rows.name:
...he started running and we're
not getting anywhere, mo.

rows.label: qst105707_msg0008
rows.name:
It seems this will take time, but it looks
like we can resolve the matter, including
the anti-Empire organization Lindwurm, mo.

rows.label: qst105707_msg0009
rows.name: Everyone, thank you for your help, mo.
